short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the total number of items next to the Inbox label in Outlook Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Outlook Web Inbox Counter


Enhance your Outlook Web experience with this simple yet effective extension. It adds a clear, visible count of the total number of items in your Inbox, right next to the Inbox label.


Key Features:
• Displays the total item count next to your Inbox label
• Updates automatically as your Inbox changes
• Works seamlessly with Outlook Web
• Lightweight and non-intrusive


Perfect for users who want a quick, at-a-glance view of their Inbox size without having to open or refresh the Inbox. Stay informed about your email volume effortlessly!


Compatible with Outlook Web (outlook.office.com and outlook.office365.com).


Streamline your email management today with Outlook Web Inbox Counter!
